font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } .header-logo { display: none; } .toolbar-content ion-title>div { opacity: 0; } .toolbar-content:before { width: 50%; content: ""; background-image: url(https://apphopewell.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/hopewellheader.png); height: 60px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center bottom; background-size:contain; z-index: -1; position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 10px; margin: auto; color: white; height: 60px; content: ''!important; background-size: contain; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; background-position: center; z-index: -1; display:none; } ion-icon.icon:before{ content:""; background: url(https://mtairyapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/menu-icon.png); display: block; background-size: contain; width:45px; height:45px; } ion-title{ display:none; } *{ border:none!important; } .ion-page ion-content, .ion-page ion-list .item { color: ; background-color: ; margin-top: -18vh; height: 118vh; } .toolbar-background, .toolbar-background-ios, .tabs .tabbar, .tabs-ios .tabbar, .custom-page .menu-card { background: transparent; } ion-content{ background: #040c1d; } .menu-inner ion-list .item{ background:none; border:none; left:2vw; text-transform:uppercase; font-family: 'AvenirLT-Black'; } .menu-inner ion-list button.selected .label{ color:#2e0147; } .menu-inner ion-list .item:nth-child(1){ margin-top:12vh; } .back-button .back-button-text { display: none!important; } ion-list.list{ margin-top:12vh; } ion-avatar, p.loggedin-msg { display: none; } .menu-inner .content{ background: url(https://mtairyapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/menu-bg.png); background-size:cover; background-position:center; } ion-title{ text-align:center; text-transform: uppercase; font-family: 'GothamBlack'; } .toolbar-background{ border-color:transparent; } .toolbar-content, .toolbar-title, .bar-button-default, .toolbar .bar-button-default:hover, .toolbar .segment-button, .toolbar button.activated, .tabs .tab-button .tab-button-icon, .tab-button .tab-button-text, .tabbar .tab-button[aria-selected=true] .tab-button-icon, ion-toolbar .button, .toolbar input.searchbar-input { color: #636363; } .label { padding-left:2vw; text-align: left; font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing:1px; color:#fffec6; } .input-wrapper{ margin-bottom: 2vw; margin-top: 2vw; } .input-wrapper:active { background:url("https://mtairyapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/button-bg.png"); background-size:cover; background-repeat:no-repeat; max-width: fit-content; } .input-wrapper:active .label{ color:#2e0147; } ion-list.list { margin-top: 0vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .menu-inner ion-list .item { display: block; margin: 0 auto; } .menu-inner ion-list ion-icon { color:#d3352c; position: absolute; font-size: 25px; left:68px; top:4px; } .show-menu .menu-inner > ion-header{ display:none; } .bar-button .button-inner .ion-md-share{ display:none; } .header-md::after{ background:none; } .menu-inner ion-list .item, .menu-inner ion-list > .item:last-child, .menu-inner ion-list > .item-wrapper:last-child .item { border-bottom: none; } .item-block .item-inner{ border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(222, 222, 222, 0.3) !important; } .menu-inner .list-ios .item-ios .item-inner { background-image: none; } .menu-inner ion-list .item-block .item-inner { margin-left: 0px; } .item-md{ padding-right:16px; } .menu-inner ion-list .item{ left:0; } ion-label{ white-space: inherit; } ion-buttons>button.bar-buttons{ height:50px; } /************************/ /************************/ /************************/
